name: A Curse From The Gods
description:
Made for the Kenney Game Jam!

You're in your worst nightmare- can you harness the  god's curses on humanity to escape it? Play this short-metroidvania to find out!

Please note that this game was made in 48 hours, and therefore might have a few bugs. In specific, if you get stuck in between an enemy and a wall, you will fall of the map. This can be resolved by holding 'P' to kill yourself. Don't worry- this will only take you back to the first room, with all of your score and curses still in tact!

 In addition, please play the game in the browser, for better performance.
